Interface Purchasable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Armor, Axe, CombatKnife, Hammer, KevlarJacket, KnuckleDusters, LeatherJacket, Machete, Potion, Revolver, Rifle, RiotSuit, ShotGun, Weapon, WoodenStick
public interface Purchasable
Interface for items that can be purchased in the shop.
